channel.title: Recruiting small team
channel.description:
hello, i am looking for the following: website coder (one open) server coder (two open) client coder (one open)
and this is the forum: posistion wanted: experince: proof: why do you want this posistion?:
and if you are applying for client coder i will want this: a custom client that can only connect to this server and able to make custom items and a custom gameframe

item.title: Recruiting small team

item.description:

i would help but i am currently working on making my own server

Read full topic

item.title: Recruiting small team
item.dc:creator: @jinglesassy jinglesassy
item.description:
@jinglesassy wrote:

ok, thanks, but i never said i want the most experinced coders, i just need ppl who can code better then me(and i am pretty bad at it)

item.title: Recruiting small team
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Sorry to say, these days, I don’t think a lot of the highly experienced coders do RS2 Private Servers anymore. I mean, I’m not even bothering for a team right now. I’m doing a lot of the coding by myself.

Read full topic
